Problem Statement: PS1: Trend of India's Happiness Index (2005-2024)
Objective 1: O1.1: Analyze year-on-year trend in happiness score
Objective 2: O1.2: Identify factors contributing to rank fluctuations

Problem Statement: PS2: Relationship between GDP and Happiness Score
Objective 1: O2.1: Determine correlation between GDP per capita and happiness
Objective 2: O2.2: Assess whether economic growth translates to happiness

Problem Statement: PS3: Role of Social Support and Life Expectancy
Objective 1: O3.1: Examine impact of social support on happiness score
Objective 2: O3.2: Analyze role of healthy life expectancy

Problem Statement: PS4: Comparative analysis with top-ranked countries
Objective 1: O4.1: Compare India with top 5 happiest countries
Objective 2: O4.2: Identify gaps and areas for improvement
